Articles.Content: Hi fellow KSP fans i have some screen shots i modded an would like to show you. Ok just tried to show you but how do i upload them? please help i'm new here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_wink.gif

Hi fellow KSP fans i have some screen shots i modded an would like to show you. Ok just tried to show you but how do i upload them? please help i'm new here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_wink.gif

host them on imgur or some other place then use the tool when posting to link them
ok thanks Rareden but i don't want to have to sign up to anything is it possible to do it with out sining up to anything???

ok thanks Rareden but i don't want to have to sign up to anything is it possible to do it with out sining up to anything???

Not really possible to reliably host images that way. Making an account there is no harder than when you made yours here. It's also completely free, so no worries of paying anything.
Yes but I don't wont like 100000000000 accounts every were. Someone please help me any Ideas would be helpful
I don't think you have to be signed in to upload images to imgur... But I don't know how reliable the hosting is when you aren't (or if it's the exact same... :/)

The KSP forum servers simply can't host the thousands of images and videos that have already been produced (cost, code, maintenance). A hosting site is something completely different to do than a forum, and there's plenty of them, imgur being the most simple and user-friendly. Give it a try!
Use imgur, no sign up is required. If you want to know about reliability, I'll just say that I use it to host my signature.

1. Upload it to imgur

2. Copy the link like this:

And it comes out like this:

Yes but I don't wont like 100000000000 accounts every were. Someone please help me any Ideas would be helpful

Check this out. I am pretty sure you can find what you're looking for right here.
